languages.text: {n}Время на миг останавливается, а затем, словно подброшенное взрывной волной, летит вперед убийственной шрапнелью событий.{/n}
{n}Time stops for a moment, and then, as if tossed by a blast wave, the events fly forward like murderous shrapnel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Время на миг останавливается, а затем, словно подброшенное взрывной волной, летит вперед убийственной шрапнелью событий.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Time stops for a moment, and then, as if tossed by a blast wave, the events fly forward like murderous shrapnel.{/n}
{n}Time stops for a moment, and then, as if tossed by a blast wave, the events fly forward like murderous shrapnel.{/n}

{n}Time stops for a moment, and then, as if tossed by a blast wave, the events fly forward like murderous shrapnel.{/n}

{n}Time stops for a moment, and then, as if tossed by a blast wave, the events fly forward like murderous shrapnel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Zeit hält für einen Moment an, und dann überstürzen sich die Ereignisse wie eine Explosionswelle, die mörderische Schrapnelle nach vorne schleudert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Time stops for a moment, and then, as if tossed by a blast wave, the events fly forward like murderous shrapnel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Zeit hält für einen Moment an, und dann überstürzen sich die Ereignisse wie eine Explosionswelle, die mörderische Schrapnelle nach vorne schleudert.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El tiempo se detiene por un instante, y después, como impulsados por una onda expansiva, los eventos se suceden como metralla destructiva.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Time stops for a moment, and then, as if tossed by a blast wave, the events fly forward like murderous shrapnel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El tiempo se detiene por un instante, y después, como impulsados por una onda expansiva, los eventos se suceden como metralla destructiva.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一瞬時間が止まる。それからまるで爆風に翻弄されるかのように、その瞬間は殺人的な榴散弾の如く進んで行く。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Time stops for a moment, and then, as if tossed by a blast wave, the events fly forward like murderous shrapnel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一瞬時間が止まる。それからまるで爆風に翻弄されるかのように、その瞬間は殺人的な榴散弾の如く進んで行く。{/n}

languages.text: {n}时间停止了片刻，之后仿佛冲击波来袭一般，所有的一切都像致命的弹片一般四散飞去。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Time stops for a moment, and then, as if tossed by a blast wave, the events fly forward like murderous shrapnel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}时间停止了片刻，之后仿佛冲击波来袭一般，所有的一切都像致命的弹片一般四散飞去。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le temps s'arrête un instant, puis, comme sous l'effet d'une once de choc, les événements s'enchaînent à la façon d'un déluge d'éclats d'obus meurtriers.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Time stops for a moment, and then, as if tossed by a blast wave, the events fly forward like murderous shrapnel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le temps s'arrête un instant, puis, comme sous l'effet d'une once de choc, les événements s'enchaînent à la façon d'un déluge d'éclats d'obus meurtriers.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir anlığına zaman duruyor. Ardından olaylar, âdeta basınç dalgasıyla fırlatılmışçasına ölümcül bir şarapnel misali gelişiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Time stops for a moment, and then, as if tossed by a blast wave, the events fly forward like murderous shrapnel.{/n}
